children.text: All of the tears and punctures in the vapour barrier around the penetrations have been adequately taped and sealed.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.3.4 Installation of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings that

‘Both vapour barriers and damp-proofing membranes shall be placed beneath the slab so that the bottom surface of the slab and beams, including internal beams, is entirely underlaid’ and that ‘Penetrations by pipes or plumbing fittings shall be taped or sealed with a close-fitting sleeve or made continuous with the vapour barrier or damp-proof membrane by taping or by lapping’.
Any areas where deficiencies were identified have been sealed and repaired, with the area ready for concrete to be poured.
